txt.en: This branch is covered in aromatic holly-leaves. You have heard that the Elves can brew fine teas from the leaves of many different trees. Perhaps one of the Elves in Gwingris can brew something from these holly-leaves if you gather more?
'What is this that you have brought to me, [placeholder]? Ah, holly-leaves. I can indeed brew a fine tea from these.'
'What is this that you have brought me, [placeholder]? Ah, holly-leaves. I can indeed brew a fine tea from these if you bring me more.'
While holly-berries are generally considered to be poisonous, holly-leaves are often used in the brewing of tea.
Bring the holly-leaves to Celebrandir in Gwingris
Holly-trees can be found throughout Glâd Ereg. Celebrandir is encamped at Gwingris in the northern reaches of Glâd Ereg.\n\nYou should gather more holly-leaves and bring them to the Elf Celebrandir.
